channel.title: Why was I banned?
channel.description:
This seems like the only place to post this but on the moparisthebest.com forums I was banned for spamming. My name on there is RXVL. Can someone (like Moparisthebest) please tell me what I spammed because I think one of my friends hacked into my account and posted random messages. Otherwise, can anyone please post my most recent post so I can tell if it were me or not?
Please do not lock this or flame me.
-Thank you-
RXVL
Owner of the ZezumaScape franchise

item.title: Why was I banned?
item.dc:creator: @not2good not2good
item.description:
@not2good wrote:

Wow after looking through like the first page, I think only a few were decent posts. I saw alot of incomplete sentences and posts. Maybe instead of dedicating a whole post to “np” you could add something.

Read full topic

item.title: Why was I banned?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Latest post ‘Check out the ZezumaScape2 MoparScape forum… Its friggin awesome’.

Read full topic

item.title: Why was I banned?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

I do not see a ban for you in the logs…don’t you receive a ban message when trying to log in on that account. Anyway, if you really were banned, re-signing up is not the solution…it shows a lack of respect to the ban and the community, and therefore, an email to one of the mods or admins would probably have been the best course of action. However, I will leave this thread open for now.

Also, you can view all your previous posts on the other account here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=16237;sa=showPosts

Read full topic
